summary: A command‑line script that shows how to run NeMo CTC‑based speech‑to‑text models outside of PyTorch Lightning, performing buffered chunked inference on batches of audio files and writing the transcriptions, also serving as a CI test for pretrained checkpoints.
business_intent: Provide a ready‑to‑use example for large‑scale automatic speech recognition inference, enabling developers to integrate, evaluate, and continuously test pre‑trained ASR models in production pipelines.
